card_desc: You pay our old roommate a visit for some expert hardware advice. Unfortunately, your car gets rear-ended on the way back. Hardware problem solved, but your wallet is a bit lighter.
Fishing...woodworking...gardening...cooking...what's your new hobby? You may be spending a lot on supplies, but your ming is more rested and creative.
Turns out that the manufacturer offers documentation for their proprietary protocol for sale on their web site. Makes finding a vulnerability that much easier-no reverse engineering necessary!
Whether it's to provide a distraction, corroborate your story, or play Bad Cop, sometimes having an extra body around makes all the difference.
The advanced hacking course you enrolled in included some powerful reverse engineering software. Too bad it's just a trial version.
Chocolate fountain, open bar, and a hovering chandelier. You throw the best parties, and everybody who's anybody is there.

You don't mind getting dirty. You're happy to dig through a company's garbage to look for un-shredded specs, documentation, and inter-office memos. This time the client's guards are vigilant. Hire a garbage truck, then go through your haul off-site.
